MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH36 postcode area of Humbie, affecting properties in Mavishall Cottages and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am due to a faulty fuse unit and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
